text: Chinese singer G.E.M. () has released six studio albums, three EPs, two live albums, one compilation album, and twenty-six singles. ==Albums== ===Studio albums=== {| class="wikitable" |- !style="width:19em;" | Title !style="width:18em;" | Album details |- !18... | *Released: 27 October 2009 *Label: Hummingbird *Format: CD, Digital Download |- !My Secret | *Released: 28 October 2010 *Label: Hummingbird *Format: CD, Digital Download |- !Xposed | *Released: 5 July 2012 *Label: Hummingbird *Format: CD, Digital Download |- !Heartbeat | *Released: 6 November 2015 *Label: Hummingbird *Format: CD, Digital Download, LP |- !Happily Ever After | *Released: May 10, 2018 *Label: Hummingbird *Format: Digital Download, LP |- !City Zoo | *Released: 27 December 2019 *Label: Sony Music Entertainment Taiwan Ltd. *Format: CD, Digital Download, LP |} ===EPs=== {| class="wikitable" |- !style="width:19em;" | Title !style="width:18em;" | Album details |- !G.E.M. | *Released: 15 October 2008 *Label: Hummingbird *Format: CD, Digital Download |- !25 Looks | *Released Date: 30 September 2016 *Label:Hummingbird *Format: CD, Digital Download |- !My Fairytale | *Released Date: 30 August 2018 *Label:Hummingbird *Format: CD, Digital Download |- !Fearless | *Released Date: 9 November 2018 *Label:Hummingbird *Format: CD, Digital Download |- !Queen G | *Released Date: 28 December 2018 *Label:Hummingbird *Format: CD, Digital Download |} ===Live albums=== {| class="wikitable" |- !style="width:19em;" | Title !style="width:18em;" | Album details |- !Get Everybody Moving Concert | *Released: 26 November 2011 *Label: Hummingbird *Format: CD |- !X.X.X.
